definitions.definition: mathematics, especially as a subject in school

examples.text: The core subjects are English, maths and science.
I was taught to use Venn diagrams in the maths class.
Those expert in maths and technology were not always good managers of people.
Council tax inspectors are being given maths lessons.

definitions.definition: the process of calculating using numbers

examples.text: If my maths is/are right, the answer is 142.
The class was struggling to find the solution to a maths problem.
Working out the quantities of the ingredients involved some complicated maths.

definitions.definition: to think carefully about something before doing it so that you know all the relevant facts or figures

examples.text: Do the maths before you take on more debt.
If only someone had done the maths!
